Company Description

Steiner Consulting, Inc. (SCI) is a heavy civil-engineering consulting firm focused on driving Southern California infrastructure. Founded in 2019, SCI is a certified small and disadvantaged business by Jill Steiner, who has extensive experience in high-profile transportation projects in Los Angeles. SCI specializes in third-party and utility disciplines to guide projects through design, permitting, and construction phases.


Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Utility Coordinator at Steiner Consulting Inc. The Utility Coordinator will be responsible for coordinating with utility companies, utility designer and relocation activities, resolving utility conflicts, and ensuring compliance with regulations and project timelines.


Qualifications

  • Experience in utility coordination, management, and conflict resolution
  • Knowledge of utility design and relocation processes
  • Strong organizational and project management skills
  • Ability to communicate effectively with utility companies, stakeholders, and project teams
  • Attention to detail and problem-solving abilities
  • Experience in heavy civil engineering projects is a plus
  • Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, or related field
